attributes.action: Urgently form and implement a strategy to combat the surge in racial hostility.
attributes.additional_details: No matter how you voted, if you do not condone acts of racial hatred, abuse and hostility, please, PLEASE use your democratic power to do something to stop this. Sign this petition now.
attributes.background: The referendum has been damaging and divisive. This country is wounded. But we CAN'T allow our country's current vulnerabilities to be exploited. Now more than ever we need government to act decisively, send a clear message, & correct the harmful narrative. The UK will NOT tolerate racial hostilty.
